author: eptwts
text:
i cannot imagine a world where i'm tied to a wage, lets say $8k/month at an office job...

and there being no way of increasing that other than licking your bosses ass to get a promotion

when the average guy is complaining about a lack of money & you tell him to "just make more" - he'll look at you like he just saw an alien

but that's exactly what he should do - just make more lol

the idea of making more than the salary you're tied down by is extremely foreign to someone not in our world
